detail_desc: Top in soft, printed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with spaghetti shoulder straps and a racer back.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back with mesh detail. Wide elastic at the hem. Light support.
Dungaree shorts in superstretch twill with adjustable straps and metal fasteners. Pocket at the top, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and raw-edge hems.

Strapless bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and side support.
Jumper in a soft pattern knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved shirt with a bow tie or tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a flounce at the front and over the shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.
Vest top in soft jersey containing some linen with a frilled lace trim at the hem.
Blouse in a cotton crêpe weave with a grandad collar, button placket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, an open back pocket and tapered legs.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Wide shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, ties at the front and patch front pockets.

Coat in a felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Funnel collar with concealed press-studs, a wind flap and concealed buttons down the front, welt side pockets, three inner pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Sleeveless dress in a textured linen and cotton weave with buttons at the back and a flared skirt. The bodice is lined in a cotton weave.
Blouse in crinkled plumeti viscose with lace details. V-neck, an open front with ties at the bottom, 3/4-length sleeves and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with double-layered, elasticated ribbing at the cuffs.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative crossover elastic straps at the hem, and a narrow fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Double-layered dress in airy, patterned chiffon with raw-edge flounces. Pleats around the neckline, pleats at the front, an opening with a button at the top and a concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication and raw-edge flounces at the cuffs, decorative seams at the waist and an asymmetric skirt. Unlined. The dress is made from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bibs in soft cotton jersey with a terry back and press-stud fastening.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Swimsuit with shimmering gold-coloured print, frills at the top and glittery elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined front and crotch.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Looser fit with a low waist and crotch, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trousers in soft, stretch jersey with a high, elasticated waist and wide 3/4-length legs with decorative seams down the front.
Wide jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and a rounded hem. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Necklace in thin metal snake chain with a large disc pendant. Adjustable length 75-83 cm.

Slightly shorter, straight-cut gilet in sturdy cotton twill with a V-neck and zip down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and zipped front pockets, one that has an additional small pocket with a flap and press-stud. Decorative D-ring at the front. Unlined.
Short dress in textured jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck, short sleeves and flared skirt.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, button placket and short sleeves.
Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Large bucket bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and drawstring at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 15x29.5x31.5 cm.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in sturdy twill made from a wool blend. Turn-down collar, a classic front and long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft merino wool blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Gently fitted dress in velour with long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length kaftan woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke that continues down the sleeves, pleats at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Chunky, metal chain necklace with a pendant. Adjustable length.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Sleeveless playsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a gentle V-neck. Frill trim at the top, decorative buttons at the front and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Metal earrings in the shape of flowers with a sparkly stone in the middle. Width 6 cm.

Off-the-shoulder gingham blouse in woven fabric with elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Decorative buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and frill trim at the hem.

Short, voluminous, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton blend with a gathered frill trim and narrow elastication at the top that continues over the arms. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps long, voluminous balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with fake buttons. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up and a silicone appliqué at the front.
Short dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in a viscose and linen weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly and diagonal side pockets.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles at the top, one with a heart-shaped appliqué. Lined. Size 10x29x43 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit. Fleece lining.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in a viscose weave. V-neck vest top with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Shorts with frill-trimmed hems and an elasticated waist with a decorative bow.
Soft, non-wired bra in mesh and satin with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in soft, printed fleece with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in fast-drying jersey with a hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring at the front. Zip, concealed side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Print motif on one sleeve.
Large scarf in a soft, airy weave with fringes on the short sides.
Sandals in scuba fabric with visible zigzag seams, two straps with adjustable hook and loop fasteners at the front, and a strap at the back. Rubber insoles and soles.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline and lace yoke at the top.

Shirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length skirt in a spot-print crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waistband. Jersey underskirt.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Knee-length wrap dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, short sleeves and a tie at the waist. Longer at the back.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets at the front and welt back pockets with a button. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Opaque leggings in jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Vest tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, picot trims at the top and a decorative satin bow at the front.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Narrow plastic Alice bands, one of which is glittery. Two are covered in patterned satin, one with a bow on top.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in airy chiffon with embroidery and lace details. Elastication at the top, long, flared sleeves and an elasticated hem. Partly lined.
